title: Seedy.Dupuis | Portfolio
clickMarkers: Click on markers to know more
presentation:
I am convinced we grow with our experiments.
Tell me what you like to do, I'll tell you who you are.

Travelling, alone, by foot, towards the unknown, helped me grow and find my essence.
Volunteering taught me another way to engage myself. I don't know what I would do without music, festivals, parties. Cooking in festivals is also meeting new people, spending time as a group and help each other during rush hours.
Practicing a weather-dependent activity teaches patience and commitment.
All those outdoor activities are a mean to balance my everyday life and enjoy coming home and my desktop routine.

I'd like to share some memories with you, if you wish.
